miniapp.name: Sway
miniapp.subtitle: Shape todays wind
miniapp.description: Sway is a tiny ambient mini app where a single line sways like a reed in the wind. Tap to guide todays wind and watch your daily pattern form.
miniapp.ogDescription: Sway is a tiny ambient mini app where a single line sways like a reed in the wind. Tap to guide todays wind and watch your daily pattern form.
